content: loveland lace bow makes a sweet hair accessory to dress up or to dress down you can also use it as a bow tie applique or embellishment the free version of this pattern can be found on sunflower cottage crochet where i shared it as a guest designer https //sunflowercottagecrochet com/loveland-lace-bow-free-pattern-from-banana-moon-studio/ it can also now be found on my website here https //bananamoonstudio com/free-crochet-bow-pattern/ difficulty level easy available sizes small and large finished measurements small 3 1/4 x 1 3/4 large 4 1/2 x 2 1/4 inches yarn we crochet comfy fingering weight 75 % pima cotton 25% acrylic 218 yds 50 g yarn weight category 1/fingering/super fine about 5 to 14 yds of #9437 white crochet hook e/4 3 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle clear-drying fabric glue alligator clip optional gauge 3 pattern repeats x 14 row = 4 1/2 inches get a free digital gift when you subscribe to my newsletter https //bananamoonstudio com/newsletter-sign-up find all my latest free patterns tutorials giveaways events and reviews at https //bananamoonstudio com happy crocheting april
